snippet: A tactic being used in Lower Manhattan has drawn the attention of the police, but officers have not tried to dislodge demonstrators.
abstract: Occupy Wall Street protesters are sleeping on sidewalks of Lower Manhattan in effort to reestablish their presence in area after being ejected from their encampment in Zuccotti Park; tactic has drawn the attention of New York City police, but officers have not yet tried to dislodge the demonstrators.
lead_paragraph: A tactic being used in Lower Manhattan has drawn the attention of the police, but officers have not tried to dislodge demonstrators.

headline.seo: Evicted From Park, Occupy Protesters Take to the Sidewalks
headline.main: Evicted From Park, Occupy Protesters Take to Sidewalks
headline.print_headline: Evicted From Zuccotti Park, Occupy Wall Street Protesters Take to Sidewalks
